contacts.name: Jing Yuan
contacts.signature: I'm not at the Seat of Divine Foresight

200640000.text: {NICKNAME}, I finished reading the files that you shared with me from the data bank.

200640001.text:
After sitting in this Seat of Divine Foresight for so long, I can't help but overlook the world outside of Luofu's delves.
That, combined with the long lifespan of the Xianzhou humans, made me feel that the entire world is as boring and changeless as myself.
However, now I've read the wondrous encounters of the Express Crew, I realized that using my endless lifespan to travel various worlds would be a fun venture indeed.

200640002.text: Unfortunately... I still shoulder Luofu's countless duties and cannot accompany your group. But if I were to retire one day, what should I do?

200640003.text: Our Express is pretty big. You can come visit, general

200640004.text: Hahahaha, if that's a personal invitation, {NICKNAME}, then I might consider it.

200640005.text: Perhaps you can swap places with Fu Xuan and be the master diviner

200640006.text: Hahaha, don't ever mention that to me again. The master diviner is an exceedingly busy job. No ordinary person can face its arduous work.

200640007.text: I feel the Realm-Keeping Commission's work is quite relaxed...

200640008.text: Hahaha, that would truly take me back to my origins.

200640009.text: My parents were scholars of the Realm-Keeping Commission and were responsible for researching and recording the histories of long-life species. The paperwork involved was literal torment.

200640010.text: That reminds me... My dream as a young boy was to become a Galaxy Ranger.

200640011.text: Pity that life never goes the way you want it to go.

200640012.text: If given the chance, where would you want to go?

200640013.text: Perhaps I'll go seek out animals that have already gone extinct in Xianzhou.

200640014.text: Let us stop for today. Qingzu just carried in another pile of documents for me. Just looking at them gives me a headache.

200640016.text: I'm sorry I can't be of help...

200640017.text: It's enough for me to squeeze out some time to chat with you, {NICKNAME}.

200640018.text: All in all, I shall return to work. Farewell!
